climbs.name: The Whole Kitchen Sink
climbs.fa: Marc Yamamoto, Ashley Maryn, and Jeff Snyder

content.description: Start under two scary oven sized blocks. Pull unique bolder moves traversing left and plug a piece. From here follow the obvious right slanting BOMBER finger crack! Fire the novel crux and take the hand crack to the top. #3 & #4 make a good anchor. If this route was 20 ft longer it would be 4-star. Even after extensive cleaning up top I would still be very cautious of scary rockfall potential.
content.location: Just left of Mohairs Pinnacle. The obvious right slanting face splitter. start and belay spot are on grassy ledge underneath scary roof

content.description: The chimney behind Mohairs Pinnacle. Quite fun moderate chimney with perfect crack on main land for gear. One day when the pinnacle falls over the main land crack will be a fun new splitter!

'Love Spear' is a heady face climb with just enough gear to make it a gear lead. Climbs the main arete of the dildo, buzzing up wild sequences to the tip of Mohairs Pinnacle.  

  Expect meandering face climbing that connects the only viable gear. Look for micro mail slots for nest of stability, dont be hasty. If the crux gear rips, the fall would be devastating. Lead it or bold TopRope by slinging the tip!
content.protection: Cams   Micro Widgets   BallNutz   Runners   Rope

content.description: The rotten pillar between The Pillow Wall and The Black Pond.
